EmailTemplate.description: Notification that credit memo mod has been approved
EmailTemplate.name: UNUSED - Credit Memo Mod Approved
EmailTemplate.subject: * Change Memo Approved - {!Credit_Memo_Modifcation__c.Loan_Master__c} *
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
The {!LLC_BI__Credit_Memo_Modifcation__c.Name} for loan {!Credit_Memo_Modifcation__c.Loan_Master__c} has been approved.
See Change Memo for more information {!LLC_BI__Credit_Memo_Modifcation__c.Link}
